Cranston.Nathaniel Daggett House:
See also Daggett House, Slater Park, Pawtucket RI, built about the same time, by Nathaniel's father John.
Nathaniel Daggett House (also known as "The House that Never Moved") is an historic building located at 74 Roger Williams Avenue in East Providence, Rhode Island.
The oldest portion of this saltbox likely dates to before 1700; it is one of the oldest structures in East Providence.
